resources.string: Click on item to add to your Calendar

Christmas in the Park is an annual holiday tradition that takes place in the heart of Downtown San Jos√© at the Plaza de Cesar Chavez. For over 30 years, this whimsical event has brought people from all over the Bay Area together during the holidays. 

Christmas in the Park is a non-profit organization that is supported through fundraising efforts and is free to the public. Children can have their photograph taken with Santa, watch nightly entertainment and enjoy holiday themed refreshments.

Executive Director: Jason Minsky
Exhibit Designer: Tom Trafton
Program Manager: Shelley Romeo

Office: 1(408)297 XMAS (9627)
Fax: 1(408) 516 9792

Address:
Christmas in the Park
101 West Santa Clara Street
San Jose, CA 95113
\nIf you are interested in becoming a sponsor please tell us about yourself. Send us an email with your contact information and a brief message and someone will contact you with more information.
